name: Heart of Gold: Ashes
description:
Back again with the Heart of Gold Series!

This time it is an escape room. Meet Mason Brighton, the older brother of the family. Use the arrow keys to move around the room, and click areas of interest to see if you can investigate further!

NOTE: This game was made for a school assignment. It currently only has two levels, but I plan to add more to this as I get better at programming. So please, if there are any bugs to be found, let me know so I can fix them as I go on!
